root.name: Prehistorik
root.description: OverviewPrehistorik is an action platformer developed by Titus Interactive for home computers. In it, the eponymous caveman Prehistorik sets out on a quest to sate his hunger, requiring the player to gather a certain amount of food before being able to finish a level, either by collecting edibles he finds or by stunning and eating his enemies. The game features four regular levels with three boss levels between.
